Damn, what a pity, what else to say...
Dead man, got anything for me?
Dude's dead!
Every day...

Fuck, guys, I knew him. We were drinking together just yesterday, and now this happens...
Mutant food?!
Guys! People are dropping like flies, and Duty still says they've cleaned up the territory! Ain't that a bitch?
He was a good man, took a lot of risks and lifted our spirits during hard times... Rest in peace, my stalker brother!
He was a good man...
I'd rip those monsters' balls out so they won't be breeding again!
I'm curious, what kind of creature did that?
I'm freaking out... He said it was safe here... I was lucky refusing to go with him at the last moment, otherwise I'd probably be lying there too...
I found a body! Nobody deserves a death like this.
It's never fun when a stalker gets taken by a mutant... even if he's an enemy.
I told everybody the place was off limits with those things about! Hasn't anybody shared that on the net?
I told him the place was crawling with those bastards! He wouldn't listen, and now this happens to him...
I was lucky to avoid that place!
Just killed a hell of a hog! Got ten kilos of just the hooves!
Killing those bastards left and right, and they only get stronger...
Loser...
Men, I'm fucking pissed at these things...
Men, take note: only a bullet in the head can stop a bloodsucker.
PM me! Let's raid some mutants.
Poor guy got ripped in half! I'd rather shoot myself in the head...
Seen a horde of hogs getting fat on radioactive treats...
Serves him right!
So horrible...
So sad...
That goof couldn't even fight off a hog!
That reminds me of a funny story...
The monster just mutilated him.
This really sucks, people. I hope the poor guy didn't suffer too much...
Those mutants are everywhere now!
Those mutants got downright nasty. I'll go ping Duty about the mess they made.
We cleared the place just yesterday, should have made a trail... Fuck...
Well, fuck that guy!
Well, let's drink to the soul of that man!
Well, that's another one gone. Let our guys know to watch out for mutants.
Well, where did he get mutilated? Gotta note the coordinates...
What's here to say... He was a sucker.
What's there to say? The Zone sure ain't the place for taking a stroll.
What a horrible death! Hope the guy didn't suffer a lot...
What the hell is going on...?
Woah, that man was out of luck!
Woo, check out these hogs! Anybody need a hoof?
You're saying a beast got him?
Did they actually die? ...Or just join the zombies?
Everybody's heading there sooner or later.
You'll be remembered...
Rest in peace.
Lost to the Zone...
Let's have a drink in their memory!
Poor guys...
Should've been more careful. Too late now.
You get used to this after every emission.
People keep getting caught in those storms, many just don't make it.
They didn't make it in time, poor guys...
That's why you should be fast and aware people.
They got fried...
Fried stalkers, everybody!
Tip of the day: mark some safe spots in every area. You never know when an emission is gonna hit.
My lucky day! I just found a $what.
Anyone know the going rate for a $what?
A $what! Maybe I can finally retire!
Sakharov will want his hands on this $what!
Lucky bastard!
Lucky guy!
Mate, you're really lucky...
How come I can't find anything?
Not the best idea to announce it out of the blue.
Son of a bitch...
You just got yourself a big deal.
Congrats, my friend.
You serious?!
Meanwhile, I find nothing but rocks and rubbish.
Oh, poor me...
You probably just made yourself several enemies.
Requesting chopper assistance. Bogey located $where.
Requesting air support to our location, we need backup.
Enemy spotted $where. Air assistance needed, over.
Ground to 'Airhog', we need backup ASAP!
Requesting chopper assistance $where. We are under attack by $what.
Enemies spotted $where. Our squad is under attack by $what.
Ground-unit to Air-unit, requesting aid $where. We are being assaulted by $what!
$who has some very shitty deals. I think he ripped me off on a $what.
Anyone know when $who will get more $whats in stock?
$who has some good deals on $whats, today.
I'll be broke in no time if $who keeps raising his prices.
$what costs too much... damn.
Anyone know where I can buy $whats? $who is out of them.
Aw yes! There's some good deals on $whats, today.
Wow! Today's $what stock must've just gone on sale or something. Just got some at a bargain price.
That reminds me, I need to buy new equipment.
How much?
That reminds me, I need to find good replacement for my rusty gun.
Any discounts on medkits?
Any good discounts?
Yeah, I should stock up on supplies, too.
$who just installed the $upgrade upgrade for my lovely $what. Good shit, but any more at these prices and I'll be bled dry.
I'm confused. Does anybody know if the $what accepts the $upgrade upgrade?
The $upgrade upgrade costs too much... Heh, at least my $what feels better now.
$who said that the $upgrade upgrade would be worth my investment... I think I just got ripped off.
One is still alive. Put them out of their misery!
Quick! Over there, he is still alive.
This one thought he could get away by playing dead.
Time to put him down for good.
Let sleeping dogs lie.
There is still one left. Let's see if we can extract information.
Put this dog down!
Surrender, asshole! We know you are wounded!
He's wounded... Kill him!
Stop whining and die with some dignity.
Looks like we got ourselves a hostage, boys.
This punk thought he could escape. Someone keep an eye on him.
Do you think those stalkers will pay his ransom?
I don't think your friends are coming for you!
Looking for offers on this dickhead. If not, we'll kill him!
Let's see if we can extract information from this lowlife.
Found some good stuff in his backpack.
This bastard's got full pockets.
Now that he's dead, he won't mind me borrowing his stuff.
You don't need your stuff any more, buddy.
His pockets were full.
Not bad at all, found some good shit in his backpack.
He doesn't need his stuff any more, I'll have it.
Heh, I'm selling his stuff.
Sorry about taking your stuff buddy, but you're dead and I need to survive.
Sorry dead man, but I need your items.
Meh, nothing good, his pockets are empty.
He's got nothing special, no money in his pockets either.
Empty pockets... this guy was broke.
Didn't find anything useful, but it's better than nothing.
I found nothing but shit in his pockets. Man, I'm unlucky...
Dead bastard, what was he doing out here with empty pockets?
Guess what I found in his backpack, a Playboy.... not bad, eh?
His backpack is empty... damn it!
That bastard was carrying $what, I will keep it.
Found $what in his backpack. This will come in handy.
Would you look at this! He had $what. It's mine now.
$what! That's the best thing I found on his corpse. Won't even complain about it.
I needed this $what. Thanks for saving me from spending money, my dead friend.
He was carrying $what. I'll make good use of it.
WHO TOOK MY STASH?!!!
My stash....
HEY! LEAVE MY STUFF ALONE!
I got a signal from my stash... don't tell me someone has found it...
My PDA is beeping..... Whoever got his hands on my stash, you're gonna regret it. I promise.
Son of a bitch... They took my stash!
Goddamn it... Can't a man hide his stash in peace? I give up.
Well, sucks to be you.
Hahahaha!
That's the way it goes.
I feel for you, some asshole took my shit before, too.
You should have hidden it better.
I've just seen $who, $where. I heard someone put a bounty on his head.
I heard that someone put a bounty on $who's head.
Anyone know what's up with $who lately? He's been hanging around $where. It's almost like he is hiding from someone.
It seems $who has made some powerful enemies. From what I heard, they plan to search for him next $where.
Looks like ol' %s is looking for stalkers to do some work.
Heads up, %s has some new work available.
Anyone needs some work? I've just heard %s is looking for stalkers for a job.
%s has new work, if anyone is interested...
I saw a stalker in a helmetless SEVA around Agroprom the other day. Isn't that the kind of suit Strelok wears?
The folks I met last night mentioned that a legendary stalker has made his way back to the Zone. He's the one who shut down the Brain Scorcher a few years ago.
Can someone fill me in about this Strelok guy? I keep hearing a lot about him recently.

If the rumours are true, Ukraine's chief scientific consultant recently fled back into the Zone. He goes under the pseudonym of "Strelok". There're a lot of stories surrounding this guy, but what's his business this time?
My friend came back from his trip yesterday. He told me about some creepy guy who preached his group about a new clan. Called "Sin" or something. Did someone contact him before?
Did you guys meet this man before? He asked me to join his clan. They call themselves the "dark stalkers"... What the fuck is going on?
"We are the harbingers of a new age". These are the words of some sick fuck I met a few hours ago. Who is this guy? What does this even mean?
It seems that someone is recruiting members for an unknown side. They call themselves "Sin". I can't tell if this is some bad joke, but keep an eye for any suspicious stalkers you see.
We got some work people. Unidentified radio transmissions have been detected recently. I need volunteers to investigate the source. Details will be shared on meeting.
Veterans, we need volunteers to investigate the source of unidentified radio transmissions that have been detected recently. Details will be shared on meeting.
Stalkers, we are looking for volunteers to investigate the source of unidentified radio transmissions that have been detected recently by our scientists. Details will be shared on meeting.
Guys, we were able to detect unidentified radio transmissions. I need brave warriors to investigate the source. Meet me in the Warehouses for more details.
Unidentified radio transmissions have been detected recently. Our client wants to investigate the source in exchange of a good payment. Details will be shared on meeting.
Stalkers, unidentified radio transmissions have been detected recently. I'm looking for someone to investigate the source. Meet me in the Bunker and I will share details.
Now I've seen everything...
We made it guys, we survived the $what!
That was rough... are you okay, guys?!
Is everybody still alive?!
It's over, carry on people.
That was one hell of a $what...
It's over now... finally.
Shit, my teeth are still rattling! Everyone alright?
...oh man... my head...
All right, people. It's safe now.
Expect some havoc, a $what $when.
Expect yourselves a cataclysm, a $what will strike $when.
Find some cover, a $what is coming $when.
Guys, my equipment has already started to go nuts. Most likely signs of a $what $when.
Hermann is telling us that a $what is happening $when, so find yourselves some cover.
Hey, a $what is gonna be here $when. Stay sharp.
While Forester was upgrading my gear, he gave a warning. Says that a $what is happening $when, so stay hidden!
I visited the Ecologists at Yantar and, according to their measurements, a $what will erupt $when.
I've been told that a $what will be on its way $when. My sources are reliable, so it's probably no joke. Be careful out there.
Sakharov says that his equipment detects a $what that'll be here $when.
Sakharov warned that a $what might commence $when. Make sure you're not too far from cover around that time.
The Zone is getting angry... it'll release a $what $when.
Things are going to hell, another $what $when.
Prepare for the worst... Expect a $what $when.

Ahah, shit, I've seen everything now. A Dutyer playing another's meat flute.
Motherfucker, who ate my sausage? Gonna find that knob and teach him a lesson.
Lads, there are lots of stalkers with artefacts coming from the North.
Brothers in Jupiter, got word that you have a rat from the SSU. I bet my ass it's the one with the good weapon.
A campfire, some kissel, and sweets! Haha.
Fucking fat asswipe. Did you lose the armoury keys again?
Crikey, it was more fun around the trenches than it is in the base.
I think we've got a rat in here. Every raid so far has been a complete fuck-up... Stalkers just start blasting us before we even know.
We just ran into a flying black smoke cloud. What the hell?
What now, you wankers? Come and get me if you dare!
Don't go bothering the boss in the next couple of hours.
We jumped a couple of bitches and are going back to base.
One of my dudes been shot, can anyone come find us and take us to the base? Guys at the perimeter, can you help us?!
feelin pretty shit. Who cares, Ima have myself a beer, HEHE.
Damn, I don't get it. Where's my shooter?
Ehh... I haven't seen my mother in a long while since I joined this business.
Fucking state. You don't get shit from them, you turn the other direction, and they ruin your life for nothing.
All Clear Sky personnel, remember to use the private channel. Update the security codes regularly. Otherwise, don't complain if bandits ambush you again.
All important information must go to the private channel.
People! Novikov needs urgent help, he needs spare parts for upgrades and repairs. Go find everything he asks for. If we don't help now, we'll be shooting from our fingers before long!
Requesting Fruit Punch samples, please report back to Professor Kalancha once you acquire enough.
A lot of stalkers make the same mistake. The water in the Swamp is highly radioactive, so keep your distance. Keep plenty of anti-rad pills on hand, you never know when you'll need them.
Church garrison, we've lost contact with a research team in your area. Move to their last known position and report.
We've received a new shipment of Veles detectors. The amount is limited, so sign your name up.
Librarian here. Take it easy on the rations, supply is limited and the next shipment won't arrive any time soon.
Hey Nimble, why don't you come back? Remember the good ol' days?
New Vortex anomalies have been spotted near the entrance, watch your step on your way back.
Clear Sky is recruiting new members, preferably stalkers with great knowledge in anomalous fields. Contact Cold for more info.
There are signs of bandits camping in the northern farms. Don't let them get comfortable.
Attention, all squads: upon your arrival at the base, immediately report to the command post for instructions on the use of our new equipment models.
Attention to all squads that are in or near square e15! Confirm the presence of highly dangerous mutants in this region immediately! This information has been received from an unverified source.
Attention to all squads that are in or near square h23! Confirm the presence of highly dangerous mutants in this region immediately! This information has been received from an unverified source.
Calling all free squads! Bandit activity has once again risen in the Garbage. Clean up the sector.
Any stalkers assisting us in clearing out the path to the Bar will be rewarded.

Sergeant Saykin speaking, Fifth Squad. I'm addressing the people who committed vandalism yesterday at Rostok, on Duty grounds. If one more bottle flies through the window in Petrenko's office, any perpetrators will be shot.

Duty needs experienced and brave fighters to replenish their ranks and destroy mutants. To all those who joined our ranks, the Bar will conduct a special pricing policy. Former hoodlums are an exception!

Duty is announcing an enlistment. Any volunteer should show up at the base of operations in Rostok with a weapon, gear, and enough provisions for three days. IDs are not required. Good physical conditioning is encouraged.

We will warn you once again, anarchists. If you do not cease to send abrasive insults to the PDA of General Voronin, we will be paying your base a visit. You don't think we aren't aware of who's been doing this?
Enter the private channel and download the security update. If some lazy ass doesn't patch and info ends up leaking, he's a dead man.
Patch through all raid and mutant-related intel to the private channel. We really wouldn't want a leak.
Some brand-new SVDs have arrived in the warehouse. Anyone interested get a move on.
This is the recon team. We just saw some kind of black flying smoke in the Wild Territory. Waiting for instructions. Over.
We need experienced stalkers for a mutant raid. Payment is appropriate.
We need experienced stalkers to raid mutant hideouts. Adequate payment.
We need experienced stalkers for a snork culling operation. Payment will be generous.
Petrenko speaking. Zhivoderov, Arnie's asked you not to come to him if you capture anyone, as he doesn't have free cells at the moment. Keep them at your place for a day, and Arnie will pay you.
Petrenko, show the fuck up! What's wrong with the private channel? Down again?!
Petrenko, come in! Checking connection. My radio's broke, and I'm texting in the general channel. Sent a trooper with repair tools to the place where we'd been nailing boars yesterday.
Petrenko, this is Captain Sorokin from the Garbage speaking. Where's our ammunition?
Stalkers, join Duty! We shall cure our Earth from the deadly disease called the Zone!
Stalkers, join Duty. Protect the planet from the Zone's affliction!
Stalkers, remember: anarchy represents chaos, destruction, and death. Join Duty! Maintain order and purity in the Zone!
Stalkers, join us in our collective duty to protect and rid the world of the mutant invasion and anomalous infestation!
Okay, guys, I've received information about a group of mercenaries lingering on the outskirts of Rostok. Eyes peeled.
We have been experiencing technical difficulties with the equipment for the last two days. The connection to the database and the squads is acting up.

Captain Simonov speaking. Reporting about a strange type of mutant. An hour ago in b15, my squad and I observed a bizarre bloodsucker. It attacked a controller and decimated it with several blows before our very eyes. The beast didn't spot us. Awaiting orders.
Petrenko speaking. Kolya, confirm the info about the 10th Squad not returning from yesterday's raid. I think I've found what's left of them...
Don't gunk up the channel. Nobody cares about your lucky kills.
Attention! An unknown gas leak in square b41 has just been detected. Take appropriate measures.

If you feel your body grow heavy as the world begins to lose its colours and a jaundiced veil appears before your eyes, try to leave that area as soon as possible. You are most likely falling under the direct influence of the alternating field of psy-emissions!
Requesting helicopter to the central mobile lab in square y6_4.
There has been a burst of variable psy-emissions in sector y2_4. Be extremely careful.
Militarised research groups remind military stalkers that a SEVA-class suit will not provide you with adequate protection against many anomalous effects. Use an SSP-class suit.

Militarised research groups remind all unregistered individuals in the territory of the Chernobyl Exclusion Zone that you can approach one of our mobile bunkers and surrender. You will not be shot, you will be provided with all necessary medical assistance, and you will be consigned to the SSU at the earliest opportunity.
Any recruits among the military forces at Yantar should contact me, Professor Sakharov, immediately.
Professor Ozersky, please contact us immediately. This concerns your latest research.
Northern mobile lab, how long are we supposed to wait for those important anomalous samples from you? Enough with this absurdity!

Dear soldiers and undocumented individuals! Militarised research groups and the Scientific Research Institute of the Chernobyl Anomalous Zone would like to remind you that vodka does not contribute to the elimination of radionuclides. Use anti-radiation drugs instead.

Professor Hermann speaking. For the last two days, we have been waiting for the results of our psy-emission research from Professor Sakharov, however, he has been refusing to contact us. What is the meaning of this?
Attention! Just recently, our fighters were attacked by DUTY SOLDIERS, disguised as mercenaries. Be careful, guys. Something smells fishy.
All volunteers who join Freedom will be issued the latest Zone survival kit free of charge, along with the finest weaponry from the West! If that ain't enough, you get a head start of 2500 roubles!
To all our guys: get into the private channel and update your security codes at once. Don't clog up the channel with whining about the fact that Duty's found out about your next attack.
Join Freedom! We'll stop anyone from seizing the Zone!
Long live Freedom! With the help of the Zone, we'll make the world a better place!
Any data on the movement of mercenary squads should be left in the private channel at once. This is important.
If you're out doing a job, keep any important info in the private channel. There are people out there reading our stuff, you know!
Download the new firmware so that you don't get as many crashes.
Leshiy, where the hell have you headed off to? The boss is waiting for you in the office.
Loki, it's Lukash. Contact me privately. Got an important matter.
Max, it's Skinflint. The supplies are gonna be here in a week, hold on tight over there.
Lukash, for three days now, we've been getting nothing but dead air from you. What are we gonna do about the Monolith while they haven't crucified us?

Oi, Mishka, there was something I wanted to tell you yesterday... but I keep forgetting. Anyway, I saw a suspicious group of people to the west of our base, near the farmstead. Don't forget to tell Lukash about this, or you're just gonna get baked and let it slip your mind.
Looking for friendly company, sincere conversations, and a helping hand in future campaigns? Join us and fight alongside free men of the Zone!
They've brought in a shipment of new G36s to the warehouses. Better get 'em quick. There's practically a waiting list for them.
We going out for lunch, or what?
We're in need of experienced stalkers for an artefact hunt. We'll owe you one.

Free stalkers, Freedom speaking! If you want to live under respectable conditions in the Zone without any obligations from the military, like Duty, then come to us! We're always happy to see new faces.

Free stalkers, Freedom speaking here! What do you have to gain by consciously limiting yourself to a life under the command under a bunch of bureaucratic pigs, living in their barracks and blindly following their orders? Become a part of us and join our expeditions to the most treasured places in the Zone, tasting the life of a free man!
Greetings, stalker! It's me, your Freedom! Come visit me at my address any time: Army Warehouses, straight down the road and towards the right at the fork. ;)
Rostok today, the Verkhovna Rada tomorrow, and the whole world in two days!
Seems like they took out a massive group of zombies at Yantar today, in the workshops. There might still be a few left.
Skinflint, where'd you put all the fancy shooters? Why am I not seeing them in the armoury?

Stalker, don't you love the Zone? Have you forgotten that it gave you money and a purpose in life? Do you really want to work as an office clerk for a penny after all this is over? Join Freedom! Don't let them take away the last thing you value from you, and don't let them take away your life.
Don't spit in the bloody glasses, damn it. I'll fucking break someone's nose the next time I hear that happens.
Hey-hey-hey, rasta! We've got the best and juiciest joints! Join the real Freedom and take down the system!

This is Skinflint. I've just received a small batch of American erotic magazines...
 
%c[255,160,160,160]Anonymous
%c[default]Who the bloody hell needs those, you bellend? Everyone outside of the Zone has been using hard drives for years now, us included.
We duped a couple of bandits yesterday. I'm surprised they even remember to wear their pants each day, 'cos they're so bloody dumb!
There's a literal army of undead in Yantar going up in number everyday... What the hell we can do?...
I'm feeling creative today! Oh, I'll express myself by hanging a few Dutyers on the branches!
Chaps, guess what! The ganja, the one growing near da springboard! It hits like a truck! Hahahaaa!!!
The Syndicate is recruiting new employees. To join us, find an intermediary. Consider this your first assignment.
Information on mutant raids and other operations can be bought from an intermediary. Look for one near the Prometheus Movie Theatre.
We need experienced stalkers for targetting specific groups.
We need experienced stalkers for carrying out raids in Pripyat. Our targets are Monolith groups, contact us for more info.
Requesting an experienced mechanic with knowledge of PNV devices. The payment is decent.
Join the Mercenaries, excellent outfit and decent payment are waiting for you when the job gets done!
Molfar, some mutants managed to get our guys at the plant. It is necessary to do some clean up.
Urgent need for a good sniper, paying 15 percent of the cost of the contract...
Attention, all Syndicate employees: Kiril Yatagan's group is no longer partnered with us. Seems he has his own plans...
Andrew Lunev, nicknamed Old. There's a bounty on his head. Any information about his location will be met with good payment.

Looks like those stalkers just won't give up... Yes, I see you chucklefucks out in the reeds, making your way to the Waste Processing Station. Here's a little hint: bullet in the head, not even kidding.
I managed to make my way into Pripyat, but the activity of the Monolith squads is preventing me from breaking through...
We suggest you stay away from the Jupiter Factory. We lost contact with the last group we sent over there.
Looking for an experienced stalker, preferably a veteran tracker. Contact us for more information.
An experienced mediator is needed, payment depends on performance.
Recruiting new fighters. Former employees of the special SOBR forces will be given special consideration.
Calling all artefact hunters out there: one of our important clients is requesting specific artefacts. If you're good enough for the job, contact us as soon as possible.
I've noticed an increased number of visitors lately. Any suspicious activity near our base will be dealt with, permanently. You've been warned.

Base, this is Delta squad. We've located the entrance to the Dark Valley lab. What are our orders?
 
%c[255,160,160,160]Anonymous
%c[default]Bloody hell! Switch to the private channel!

Base, this is recon team Nightbird. We're having encryption problems and are leaving a message here. Landed in Limansk and the building site seems impenetrable. Large concentration of enemy forces: eight RPGs, five snipers, and four with additional, unknown weapons. We cannot send our coordinates, and our enemies are surely listening in on the general channel. What are your orders?
 
%c[255,160,160,160]Anonymous
%c[default]Copy, Nightbird. Return to the Red Forest immediately and regroup with Vulture. Make further decisions from there on out.
Attention! When trying to cross the perimeter, the soldiers guarding it have the right to open fire on you without warning. Do not take chances and do not break the law.
To all military stalkers operating in the area around the Darkscape and the Cordon: switch to the encrypted channel! That's an order!
All military stalkers should establish comms on the double! Everybody assemble in the channel.
Radio frequencies are cut off in square a4_4. Please report from another location near the anomalous zone.
Citizens! The Zone poses mortal danger! We're here to protect you from the Zone, not the Zone from you. Do not jeopardise your life! Do not try to penetrate into the secured area!
Requesting a helicopter in square a1_6.
Requesting a mortar strike on square e2_12.
Contracted soldiers and military stalkers: if anyone finds the wreckage of a fallen helicopter during one of the raids, please recover and deliver the flight recorder to Major Kuznetsov.
Colonel Kuznetsov, there will be an examination by two observers from the SSU tomorrow. Have a suitable reception ready.
Colonel Kuznetsov, get in touch immediately. Waiting for you in office #3.
Kestrel, it's Peony. Can you respond? There's no radio signal.
Guys, don't screw around in the ravine. Some rabid creatures have settled where we burned a few boxes a couple of days ago.
Attention, sappers: we require additional mines in square e3_16.

The Security Service of Ukraine is calling all right-minded and loyal citizens to collaborate with the authorities. Report all known cases of stalking! Only with your help can we eliminate this hideous phenomenon!
Need the defence at the northern pass strengthened in accordance with order #231. When is the armour coming in?
Soldiers, do not meddle in areas with variable psi-emissions. You'll get your damn brains fried.
A squad was lost in the area of the cemetery of sunken ships, and we have no connection with them. If anyone has seen those guys, help them out before they get into trouble.

I saw some kind of squad in our colours near Pripyat, behaving in a hostile manner and not allowing anyone to get near. I don't think these are ordinary deserters. They're headed towards the southern part of town.
Attention, soldiers of Wings at the Generators. The installation has been destabilised. Head to the bunker as instructed and begin fixing the problem immediately.
This is the storeman from the Yubileiny service centre. I'm quite worried. Are supplies expected in the near future? We don't even have enough 5.45.
Barrier-1 is in trouble at square aes2_m1. It seems they've spotted some humanoids, hardly zombies, moving at a steady pace.

A signal has arrived from the Sarcophagus. Shall I verify?
 
%c[255,160,160,160]Monolith
%c[default]Not possible. Too much background radiation and tons of creatures there. I've already told you.
Wings, come in. Are you at the objective yet?
There is no Wish Granter, but there is a group of people ahead of their time with power that knows no equal. Don't ruin the dream... With your support, we shall build a new world. A new reality.
All recruits should meet with Mentor immediately.
A horde of zombies is expected on the outskirts of Pripyat. Take action.
We have lost a detachment in Agroprom. Find them, dead or alive.
How many inquisitors are there, you say? Will a couple dozen not suffice? Well, shite. Mentor, best put your recruits to some training.
How's the situation at the Radar? Anything out of the ordinary?
Our commander's been worrying again. There's nothing to eat at the station. Where do we find provisions? My fighters will be passing on to human flesh before long.

Stalker, see what scientific activity has done to this world. It has challenged its foundations, and we need YOU to help make this world a better place. Based on the reality given to you, YOU must understand that with the help of the Brotherhood, everything becomes possible. A paradise on Earth? On the snap of your fingers. Give us your hand in supporting the existence of this miracle. Any future companions should arrive at any of our posts with arms and armour.
Where did Inquisitor's group go? We've got nothing to cover sector p_5 with.

Fellow scientists, give up your ungrateful job. All the fruits of your work shall sooner or later settle in the oligarchic minorities, and you will sink into oblivion. The brotherhood is in need of qualified specialists. Let us not offer you any rewards, but the ability for you to choose your own futures for yourselves and your loved ones.
A sentry has died by his own hand in the control room. Dispose of the corpse.
This is the squad at the station. We're running out of gear. Need help.
Inquisitors speaking. We'll be clearing out the approaches to Pripyat. Eyes sharp and clear. We work using computer.
Commander of the Barrier speaking. We have five unfettered deserters. If you meet them in the vicinity of Pripyat, open fire on them.
This is Rabbit. Shortly, we will be securing some new equipment. The men have promised that they are bringing something from the military in the Agroprom.
Every emission is a single step toward cleansing this planet.
Cleanse, purge, purify! Cleanse, purge, purify!
We shall start the war to end all wars.
Embark on the final crusade with us, stalker.
We wage war in the name of peace!
We shall excise the cancer of greed and malice from this sinful world.
The Zone gives, the Zone takes.
Oh, the almighty Monolith...
With our blood-stained hands we shall create a world of peace!
Repent.
Wallow in despair, infidels, for your time has come.
We are the harbingers of a new age.
Our deeds are atrocious, our intentions noble...
We are the necessary evil.
You cannot fight fate!
Artefacts are the fruit of the Zone.
We shall pave the way to peace with the skulls of our enemies.
Join us, or die! Join us, or die! JOIN US, OR DIE!!!
Overthrow the tyrants! Murder the murderers!
Fear the wrath of the Zone.
We shall slay millions for billions to live in peace.
Pay evil unto evil.
A period of violence, an eternity of peace.
Do not oppose the change.
Weird... the emergency signal I received was pointing to this location $location.\nI have been searching for ten minutes at least, not a single trace of the missing squad was found...
I was supposed to meet the other squad $location. Two hours have passed and there is no sign of them yet.
$mechanic speaking. Stop bringing your broken crap over here. I'm a mechanic, not a magician. I've got dozens to fix already and there isn't enough replacement parts for everybody around.
Don't gunk up the channel. Nobody cares about your lucky kills.
$trader speaking. We received new shipment of ammo and medical supplies. I don't need to remind all of you again: take it easy on them, the amount is limited.
$trader here. The next shipment of armours and gas masks won't be ready for a week at least. The main supplier faced some difficulties, hopefully it won't be much of an issue.
I don't recall seeing this number of Vortex anomalies last time I came here in $map... They're spreading everywhere. Watch your step when you pass from this location.\n$speaker out
$mechanic here. I'm looking for steel plates and carbon fibre. So if you came by any damaged armours, make sure to bring them to me and I will give you discounts on repairing services.
This is $speaker... My squad has been attacked by $target several minutes ago $location. Requesting assistance immediately!
Help! We got jumped by $target $location.\nTwo of our squad are suffering from serious injury, we can't hold it any longer!
Attention! This is $leader. I got a report from one of the squads $location. Apparently they have been attacked by $target.\nTroops nearby must provide necessary assistance at once.
One of our squads went missing $location.\nThe last message I received from them was about spotting $target moving their way... Can any of our troops nearby check their location?
$speaker reporting in. A few minutes ago, I saw $target approaching our square. They are in big numbers, it's unusual...\nWe are $location. Send nearby troops over our location.
What's going on in $map? We lost contact with the squad $location.\nSomeone saw $target roaming the place, I need more info about the situation there.
This is $speaker. Requesting assistance immediately!\nMy squad in $map has been attacked by $target a few minutes ago. We took position $location, hurry up!
Help! We got attacked by $target in $map. Three men from our squad are suffering from serious injuries, we can't hold it any longer!
We have spotted $target approaching our location $location. $leader, what are your orders?
A few minutes ago, my squad engaged $target $location. They fell back after killing two of them. One of my men got a serious injury.
$leader speaking. It seems that $target are spreading $location, they might be preparing for something.\nAll squads near the place should take caution, report any unusual movement.
One of my men spotted $target heading our way. We took position $location. If they try something funny, they will pay for it. $speaker out.
I got a report from unknown source about $target preparing for an ambush in $map. All squads at the location must take extreme caution.
We opened fire on $target in $map after ignoring our clear warnings.\nLooks like more of them are heading this way, so we'll fall back and take position $location for now. $speaker out.
I've received information about possible raid in $map. Looks like $target are looking for trouble. Eyes peeled.
$leader, this is $speaker. After a long battle with $target $location, we managed to hold two captives.\nWhat do you want to do with them?
This is $speaker. We met $target $location. One of them is suffering from a bad injury.\nI marked the location of our base for them. Make sure to provide them with medical assistance.
We got assistance from $target in $map.\n They have extra medical supplies. You can allow them to get into our base.
$target were asking for extra ammo. I met them $location. Looks like they're preparing for a hunting trip.
I saw $target roaming $location. They are searching for artefacts.\nOne of them, called $speaker, has found two at least. What do you think $leader? Sounds like a good deal.

I was talking to $target we met $location. Their commander, $speaker, mentioned unusual number of mutants heading this way.\nMy squad took position and they agreed to provide necessary assistance. Waiting for orders.
Just found dead bodies of $target here in $map, or what's left of them... Seems like some wild mutants got those poor guys.\nI'm about to reach my destination $location. $speaker out.
We came by $target on our way back. They're preparing for a raid on mutants spotted $location.\nWe'll join them and split the meat.

Weird... the emergency signal I received was pointing to this location $location.\nI have been searching for ten minutes at least, not a single trace of the missing group was found... I wonder what happened.
I was supposed to meet the rest of my group $location. Two hours have passed and there is no sign of them yet.
$mechanic speaking. Stop bringing broken shit to me. What I'm supposed to do with an gun missing half the parts?!
Don't gunk up the channel. Nobody cares about your amazing adventures.
$trader speaking. We received new shipment of ammo and medical supplies. I don't need to remind all of you again: take it easy on them, the amount is limited.
$trader here. Don't expect the next outfit shipment to arrive any time soon. We lost contact with our local supplier.
It's $speaker. Something is not right... Electro anomalies are spreading $location.\nJust watch your step when you want to pass by.
$mechanic here. I'm missing steel plates and carbon fibre.\nIf you came by any damaged armours, make sure to bring them to me and I will give you discounts on repairing services.
This is $speaker... My group has been attacked by $target a few minutes ago $location. Is there anyone nearby!
Help! We got jumped by $target $location. I lost two of my men already, we can't hold it any more...
$leader here. I got a report from the group $location.\nApparently they have been attacked by $target. I'm not sure if they made it, is there any group nearby who can assist them?

$speaker speaking. One of our groups went missing $location.\nThe last message I received from them was about spotting $target moving their way... I'm gonna check out their location, any volunteers around?
Hey! it's $speaker. A few minutes ago, I saw $target heading our way. They are in big numbers, it doesn't seem good at all...\nWe are $location. Wish us some luck.
What's going on? We lost contact with the group $location.\nSomeone saw $target roaming the place, is there anyone around who can give us more info about the situation?
This is $speaker. We need backup!\nMy group has been attacked by $target a few minutes ago. We're taking cover $location, hurry up!
Shit.... Help! We got attacked by $target in $map. I lost two guys already, we can't hold it any longer!
We just saw $target heading over here, $location. $leader, what's going on???

$leader speaking. It seems that $target are spreading $location, they might be preparing for something.\nGroups near that place should take extra caution.
One of my men spotted $target heading our way $location. If they tried something stupid, they're gonna pay for it. $speaker out.
Guess what? I just heard that $target are preparing for an ambush in $map.\nDon't take a walk in there, get your ass out.
We opened fire on $target, those idiots were pointing their guns toward us.\nLooks like more of them are coming this way.... Shit, we'll fall back and wait for them $location for now. $speaker out.
What's the deal? Just got some info about possible raid in $map. Looks like $target are looking for trouble. Watch out guys.
$leader, this is $speaker. We had a big gunfight with $target $location. We made it alive, and we have two captives right here.\nWhat should we do with them?
This is $speaker. We met $target $location. One of them is suffering from a bad injury.\nI'm gonna point out our hideout for them, you can give them some medkits.
We got assistance from $target in $map.\nThey're nice people, we got some extra medical supplies from them as well. We will stick with them for a while until we reach our destination.
$target were asking for extra ammo. I met them $location. Looks like they're preparing for a hunting trip.

Hey guys, check this out. $target are roaming $location. Looks like they are searching for artefacts.\nOne of them, called $speaker, has found two at least.\nGoddamn it... I wish I didn't forget my Bear detector.

I was talking to $target we met $location. Their commander, $speaker, mentioned an unusual number of mutants heading this way.\nLooks like those guys are gonna help us out. We will take cover and prepare our guns.

Damn... Just found dead bodies of $target here in $map, or what's left of them at least... Seems like some freaking mutant ate those poor guys.\nI'm about to reach my destination $location. $speaker out.

$mechanic speaking. I've noticed a lot of people bring me broken Bear detectors to fix. Keep in mind that those devices are limited, I don't have the necessary parts for every detector out there. Take care of your detectors guys.
It seems that the last emission has completely ruined the psi-reader I planted $location. Sad... This one was quite expensive.
$trader speaking. We received new supply of gas masks.\nDon't worry, there is enough for everybody around.
$trader here. I need Fruit Punch samples, head to the anomalous fields nearby and bring as much as you can.

I don't recall seeing this number of Gas anomalies last time I came here in $map... The anomalous activity is unusual. We need to take necessary precautions, this could mean something's about to happen. $speaker out.
$mechanic here. I'm looking for samples from gravitational anomalies. It's for an experimental outfit upgrade I'm currently working on.\nMake sure to bring me what you can find.

$leader speaking. It seems that $target are spreading $location, they might be preparing for something. All groups near the place should leave at once.
